content: **click the button over to the right to download a pdf to your ravelry library ** also available at knitting on the net 1 1 http //www knittingonthenet com/patterns/mittensgauntlets htm i designed these gauntlets so the cable would come off the ribbing without changing the stitch count they are a quick fairly easy knit a great introduction to a thumb gusset and easy cables for a first time cable the end result is beautiful and these make a nice gift update 10/17/07 - i made a few corrections/adjustments to the pattern on the blog in bold thanks to those of you who have made these and pointed these errors out update 1/6/08 - i have completely updated the pdf and it is now available here on ravelry if you are unable to download it for any reason message me and i ll happily email it to you
